name: #procjam - island procject
description:
Island ProcJect

Prototype procedural island world. World generates island, roads, buildings connected to roads, monsters and treasures.

You can move around the island by double clicking on target tiles (Heroes 3 style). At the moment the only thing you can do is explore the island and its beauty. Click "generate" button to create new world.

Project made by
Bojan Kerec (programming the beautiful generation),
Jan Trstenjak (trying to help with gen :P )

Known Bugs:
- wierd spawns for elements (ie. house spawns at sea,..)
- small island spawn (island to small to spawn anything on it)
- I'm sure there is more but I'm to sleepy :)
